subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets' creative offensive plays this season are the brainchild of Brian Schottenheimer, the first-year offensive coordinator and the son of the San Diego Chargers’ coach, Marty Schottenheimer.
snippet: The Jets' creative offensive plays this season are the brainchild of Brian Schottenheimer, the first-year offensive coordinator and the son of the San Diego Chargers’ coach, Marty Schottenheimer.
